title: Ep 142: Civic Beauty with Vote! The Podcast
itunes:title: Ep 142: Civic Beauty with Vote! The Podcast
itunes:subtitle: Kate is restless over some wrinkles, while Doree’s feeling good in her new office chair. Then they welcome Kat Calvin (Spread the Vote) and Andrea Hailey (Vote.org) from Vote! The Podcast on the show to discuss why people should vote, what voter suppre...
description:
Kate is restless over some wrinkles, while Doree’s feeling good in her new office chair. Then they welcome Kat Calvin (Spread the Vote) and Andrea Hailey (Vote.org) from Vote! The Podcast on the show to discuss why people should vote, what voter suppression really looks like, and why it’s important to stay civically active beyond the Presidential election. Plus, they share what self-care looks like during an election season and what their favorite hair and skincare products are.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

 

BEST FIENDS - Download Best Fiends FREE on the Apple App Store or Google Play. That’s FRIENDS without the R – Best Fiends.

 

CALM - For 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.

 

ELF - Go to elfcosmetics.com/f35 and use promo code F35 to get 25% off your e.l.f. purchase of $40 or more!

 

SWEATY BETTY - Now through November 1st get TWENTY PERCENT OFF your ENTIRE purchase when you visit sweatybetty.com/FOREVER35. 

 

Marriage & Martinis - Listen to Marriage & Martinis wherever you get your podcasts!


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
